name: searchFlights
description: Search for flight offers for a specific route and date

origin.description: Three-letter IATA airport code for departure (e.g., JFK)

destination.description: Three-letter IATA airport code for arrival (e.g., LAX)

carrier.description: Airline carrier code(s) to filter results (e.g., 'AA' for American Airlines, 'BA' for British Airways). Multiple codes can be comma-separated (e.g., 'AA,BA,DL'). Optional.
